unnormalised: Interesting to see Ishan Kishan potentially moving to Mumbai FC. His form has dipped since the World Cup. Reminds me of that scene in "Chak De! India" where commitment wavers. A Rs. 2 Crore transfer would be substantial. Can Mumbai's coach, Mr. Sharma, reignite his spark? This could impact India's chances in the Asian Games next year. Perhaps a stint at NIS Patiala would benefit him too.
normalised: Interesting to see Ishan Kishan potentially moving to Mumbai F C. His form has dipped since the Cup. Reminds me of that scene in "Chak De! India" where commitment wavers. A rupee two crore transfer would be substantial. Can Mumbai's coach, Mister Sharma, reignite his spark? This could impact India's chances in the Asian Games next year. Perhaps a stint at N I S Patiala would benefit him too.
